MSG_COUNT_ALERT_DETAILS: Raise an alarm when message count is {{messageCountOperator}} than {{messageCountCount}} for a timeframe of {{timeStamp}} minutes. Consecutive alarms will be raised at a delay of {{messageCountGrace}} minutes (Grace Period). Alarm message should include last {{messageCountBacklog}} messages that satisfy this alarm condition.
FIELD_VALUE_ALERT_DETAILS: Raise an alarm when {{fieldValueType}} of field {{fieldValueField}} of the message has a value {{fieldValueThreshholdType}} than {{fieldValueThreshhold}} for a timeframe of {{timeStamp}} minutes. Consecutive alarms will be raised at a delay of {{fieldValueGrace}} minutes (Grace Period). Alarm message should include last {{fieldValueBacklog}} messages that satisfy this alarm condition.
FIELD_CONTENT_ALERT_DETAILS: Raise an alarm when message has field {{fieldContentField}} same as {{fieldContentCompareToValue}}. Consecutive alarms will be raised at a delay of {{fieldContentGrace}} minutes (Grace Period). Alarm message should include last {{fieldContentBacklog}} messages that satisfy this alarm condition.
CREATE_STREAM_PAGE: Create rules to configure your own alarms and flow rules
STREAM_SUBSCRIBE_ADD_SUCCESS: You have {{crud}} for this rule successfully !!
ERROR_RETRIEVE_ALERTS: Either Service not found or no configured alarm found !!
ERROR_RETRIEVE_STREAMS: Either Service not found or no configured rule found !!
ERROR_RETRIEVE_STREAM_RULES: Either Service not found or no configured flow rules found !!
ERROR_RETRIEVE_LOG_MESSAGES: Either Service not found or no configured log messages found  !!
ERROR_RETRIEVE_DASHBOARDS: Either error in retrieving the dashboards or no relevant data found !!
